com.intland.codebeamer.persistence

Class InputStreamTypeHandlerWithStreams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ibatis.type.TypeReference<T>
      • org.apache.ibatis.type.BaseTypeHandler<java.lang.Object>
        • com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.InputStreamTypeHandlerWithStreams
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.ibatis.type.TypeHandler<java.lang.Object>

    public class InputStreamTypeHandlerWithStreams
extends org.apache.ibatis.type.BaseTypeHandler<java.lang.Object>
    Type handler for loading/storing BlobStreamDto into database. According to the PostgreSQL jdbc documentation this can only use getBytes()/setBytes() and getBinaryStream()/setBinaryStream() to access bytea (its blob). So that class must be an TypeHandler subclass, because the TypeHandlerCallback does not have get/setBinaryStream() methods on ResultGetter class.
